name: Sodwose
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, restrained, unconscious

actions.name: Grass Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 15 ft., one creature,. 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage and target must make DC 15 Str save or be pulled up to 10 ft. to sodwose.

actions.name: Entangle (1/Day)
actions.desc: Compels all plants and roots within 20' of a point on the ground it can see within 60' of it to grasp and pull at nearby creatures for 1 min. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there creature is restrained by grasses and roots (DC 15 Str negates). A creature including the restrained creature can take an action to free it by making a DC 15 Str check.

special_abilities.name: Grassland Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: Dex (Stealth) to hide in grassland.

special_abilities.name: Scarecrow
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 ft. of sodwose: frightened until the end of its next turn (DC 15 Wis negates and is immune to sodwoseâ€™s Scarecrow for the next 24 hrs).
